name: 1870 Sour

ingredients.item: George Dickel Old No. 8 Tennessee Whisky
Ravenswood Sonoma County Old Vine Zinfandel

glass: Mason jar or Bordeaux wine glass
preparation:
Add all the ingredients except the wine to a shaker.
Shake vigorously (without ice) for 10 seconds.
Fill with ice and shake for an additional 15 seconds.
Fine strain into a chilled 8-ounce Mason jar or a Bordeaux wine glass.
Float the wine on top using a spoon.
